title: bring back the old day snap
text: app glitches sooo much now. spent a good while taking photos with the filters because I did a dope makeup look. didn’t want just a regular plain jane photo so of course i was going to use snap. unfortunately snap decided to GLITCH (said i couldn’t record then logged me out with no option to back up or save all the photos/videos i just took). which ok cool. things happen. wish i would’ve saved them quicker but how was i supposed to know 30 mins later i’d be logged out. snap also does this thing where if i scroll to the story side (right), it randomly starts opening other’s stories and ads without me even clicking on anything? the old snap would’ve never done this. could sit there for hourrrs spamming snaps and it not glitch or bug out. gimme my photos back and the old snap please update: more than just yesterday photos were deleted. over a week’s worth of snap memories are gone. they were all saved and backed up as im on wifi everyday at work. makes nooo sense snap. slackinnnnn
